title: Run FO-02 E2E test and fix issues
description:
Run the E2E test in headed mode to verify complete flow:

Prerequisites:
1. KV entries seeded (npm run db:seed)
2. Dev server running (npm run dev)

Run test:
node --import tsx e2e/fo-02.test.ts

Expected: Complete flow from Step 0 to Step 10 with all 3 batches generating successfully.

Fix any issues discovered during the test run.
acceptance_criteria: E2E test passes, complete flow works from Step 0 to Step 10
